professional_summary: Experienced in SQL Server administration, ETL processes, and report generation using SSRS. Expertise in designing high-availability solutions and maintaining database jobs and maintenance plans.

key_responsibilities: Performed SQL Server administration and optimization.
Developed SSIS ETL packages for data integration and loading into data warehouses.
Generated reports using SSRS for diverse stakeholders.
Designed and implemented SSIS solutions for data integration.
Configured SSRS reports tailored to user requirements.
Maintained and scheduled ETL jobs and maintenance plans.

education.institution: Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University - Ananthapur, Tamil Nadu, India

MS SQL Server (2000/2005, 2008 R2/2012/2014/2016)",
